name: Indent Guides
description: Marks list indentation with vertical lines to make it easy to follow.

options.description: The type of line to use for indent guides.
By default, indent guides are coloured based on the current theme. Rainbow mode uses alternating colours at each indent level to better connect corresponding blocks in longer lists.
Shows indent guides for Notion's to-do list blocks.
Shows indent guides for Notion's bulleted list blocks.
Shows indent guides for Notion's numbered list blocks.
Shows indent guides for Notion's toggle list blocks.
Shows indent guides for Notion's toggle heading blocks.
Shows indent guides for Notion's table of contents blocks.
Shows indent guides for the Outliner's table of contents in the side panel.
